nodes.text: Byblos Drive Yards was a starship manufacturer based in the Colonies region industrial world of Byblos.

The firm was best known for heavy-duty transports, freighters, and industrial mining and construction starships. Its subsidiary Byblos RepulsorDrive produced combat cloud cars and airspeeders for use by planetary defense and security forces.

The company was an old one; it was flourishing as early as 4000 BBY. At that time, its products were held to be of questionable quality, but its technicians were easily bribed to make legal and illegal adjustments in their products.
